    • Uses of Message in org.gbif.common.messaging.api

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<Class<? extends Message>> MessageRegistry.getRegisteredMessages()
      Returns an immutable set of all registered message classes.
      Methods in org.gbif.common.messaging.api with parameters of type Message 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void MessagePublisher.send(Message message)
      Sends a message to the default exchange for this message and uses the routing key calculated from the message.
      void MessagePublisher.send(Message message, String exchange)
      Sends a message to the given exchange using the routing key calculated from the message.
      Method parameters in org.gbif.common.messaging.api with type arguments of type Message 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.google.common.base.Optional<String> MessageRegistry.getExchange(Class<? extends Message> message)
      Gets the default exchange used for this type of message.
      com.google.common.base.Optional<String> MessageRegistry.getGenericRoutingKey(Class<? extends Message> message)
      Gets a routing key that can be used to receive all messages of this type no matter if they are using a more specialized routing key or not.
      void MessageRegistry.register(Class<? extends Message> message, String exchange, String routingKey)
      Registers a new message in this registry.
      void MessageRegistry.unregister(Class<? extends Message> message)
      Deletes any information this registry might have about a message type.

    • Uses of Message in org.gbif.common.messaging.api.messages

      Subinterfaces of Message in org.gbif.common.messaging.api.messages 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  DatasetBasedMessage
      A convenience interface for those that would like to generically handle those messages that contain dataset keys.
      Classes in org.gbif.common.messaging.api.messages that implement Message 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CrawlErrorMessage
      We send this message every time we encounter an error during crawling.
      class  CrawlFinishedMessage
      We send this every time we finish a crawl.
      class  CrawlRequestMessage
      We send this message every time before we make a request to an endpoint.
      class  CrawlResponseMessage
      We send this message every time we get a response from an endpoint.
      class  CrawlStartedMessage
      We send this message every time we actively start to crawl a dataset.
      class  DeleteDataResourceOccurrencesMessage
      This message instructs the occurrence deletion service to delete all occurrence records for the given data resource id (the legacy id from the MySQL portal).
      class  DeleteDatasetOccurrencesMessage
      This message instructs the occurrence deletion service to delete all occurrence records for the given dataset.
      class  DeleteOccurrenceMessage
      This message instructs the occurrence deletion service to delete a single Occurrence.
      class  DwcaDownloadFinishedMessage
      We send this every time a darwin core archive has been downloaded.
      class  DwcaMetasyncFinishedMessage
      We send this every time the dataset metadata found in a darwin core archive has been deposited in the metadata repository.
      class  DwcaValidationFinishedMessage
      We send this every time a darwin core archive has been validated after being downloaded and its metadata has been synchronized.
      class  FragmentPersistedMessage
      The message sent whenever an occurrence fragment is persisted.
      class  OccurrenceFragmentedMessage
      We send this message for every new occurrence fragment we produce.
      class  OccurrenceMutatedMessage
      The message sent whenever an "interpreted" occurrence has changed (either NEW, UPDATED, or DELETED).
      class  RegistryChangeMessage
      This message will be sent every time an entity in the Registry changes (which includes deletions and additions).
      class  StartCrawlMessage
      Message to send to request a new crawl of a dataset.
      class  StartMetasyncMessage
      Message to send to request a new metadata synchronisation of an Installation.
      class  VerbatimPersistedMessage
      The message sent whenever a "verbatim" occurrence is persisted.
